name: Gibbels Public Affairs
membership: We are a member of SEAP, the Society of European Affairs Professionals. Through this membership, we ensure to adhere to the stringent code of conduct, as well as contributing to improving the quality of the profession.
goal: Our organisation represents the interests of our clients towards the European Institutions. One of these clients is the European Small Business Alliance, which has been active in Brussels since 1998. Our main aim is to inform MEPs and Commission officials alike, regarding topics affecting their work and relevant to our clients. We aim for better regulation through constructive dialogue and exchange of information.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Anything SME, Aviation, digital, blockchain, hospitality, Consumer and FINTECH related, which includes the majority of the Commission's work programme.
